pageContext.claim: Much can be done with the $1.6 Billion given to building and fixing the border wall. It is just a down payment. Work will start immediately. The rest of the money will come - and remember DACA, the Democrats abandoned you (but we will not)!‚Äù
pageContext.analysis: Democrats offered to trade protection for DACA (Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals) applicants in exchange for $25 billion funding for the border wall but Trump refused to give up on immigration restrictions or extend a path for citizenship for DACA applicants.
